title: 1997년 Edwards 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Edwards. 판결일: 1997-04-08. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Missouri v. Sterling EDWARDS, Defendant/Appellant Sterling EDWARDS, Movant/Appellant v. STATE of Missouri
**판결일**: 1997-04-08
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

## 변호인

Robert E. Steele, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, St. Louis, for defendant/appellant., Jeremiah W. (Jay) Nixon, Atty. Gen., Gregory L. Barnes, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.

## 인용

- 943 S.W.2d 338

## 판결문 요약



ORDER

PER CURIAM.
After the defendant was convicted of attempted forcible rape, § 566.030, RSMo 1994, and armed criminal action, § 571.015, RSMo 1994, he was sentenced by the court as a persistent offender to consecutive terms of twenty five and ten years. He filed a motion under Rule 29.15 which was overruled. He appeals, but raises no points of error relating to the 29.15 motion.
No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum opinion for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.
The judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 30.25(b).
...
